mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (login_id, username, email, password_hash, role_code, status_code, profile_image, phone_number, address, birth_date, gender_code, join_date, last_login) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{roleCode}, #{statusCode}, #{profileImage}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, #{birthDate}, #{genderCode}, #{joinDate}, #{lastLogin})
mapper.select: SELECT id, login_id, username, email, password_hash, role_code, status_code, profile_image, phone_number, address, birth_date, gender_code, join_date, last_login, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND status_code = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT id, login_id, username, email, password_hash, role_code, status_code, profile_image, phone_number, address, birth_date, gender_code, join_date, last_login, created_at, updated_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
